price: 3. Peut-être vas-tu te tourmenter pour eux (à en mourir) parce qu’ils ne sont pas croyants !
arabic: لَعَلَّكَ بَٰخِعٞ نَّفۡسَكَ أَلَّا يَكُونُواْ مُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: laʿallaka bākhiʿun nafsaka allā yakūnū mu'minīna
